about.title: About
about.p1: svift is an open source tool data visualization tool that helps you turn numbers into beautiful charts. svift helps you produce engaging data-driven content without being a data or design expert.
about.p2: If you need to have a chart ready for your next article or twitter post within the next few minutes, svift is your choice: Make an interactive chart for an online article, produce data-driven content for your social media posts or create a beautiful infographic for your print product.
about.p3:
svift is designed and developed by Sebastian Meier, Alsino Skowronnek and Hans Hack in Berlin.

We are grateful for initial financial support provided by the MIZ Babelsberg to support the development of our first prototype.

docs.title: Docs
docs.p1: svift is currently undergoing active development. As such we are constantly updating the tool's features. We are looking forward to improving and extending its overall capabilties and adding many more functionalities as we go along. Please get in touch with us if you have suggestions or would like to contribute to the project.
docs.p2: All our code is open source software, which means that you can use it for free and even help us improve it. All our code is available on Github. Let us know if you have suggestions or would like to contribute to the project. Alternatively you can just submit a pull request.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p3: And if you really dig us, you can read more about our motivation and processes on our blog.

pro.title: Pro*
pro.p1:
svift is also available a pro tool for your organization. A small nuber of outlets are already using our system and we are continously rolling it out to others. It includes advanced features and can be highly customized according to your needs.

For example, with the pro version you can add a corporate design look (i.e. colors and custom fonts) and request new exciting chart types that stand out from the masses.
